<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5071) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 217 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Cleric](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=212)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5067); Master in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)

</column>

---

You gain the expert [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132).

<title level="2">Expert Cleric Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Cleric Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5072)
name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
prerequisite: Basic Cleric Spellcasting; Master in Religion
